text:
Had a fantastic dining experience here! The spread was generous, the grill and hotpot combo is always fun — and the service truly made it memorable.

Special shout-out to Crystal, who was absolutely amazing! She’s super affable, friendly, and impressively attentive. She cleared our plates and changed our grill sheets before we even had to ask — such proactive and thoughtful service really made us feel well taken care of.

With great food and warm hospitality like this, it’s no wonder Seoul Garden has been around for over 40 years. Will definitely be back again!

Me and my daughter had a wonderful experience at Seoul Garden! The staff were attentive, friendly, and efficient throughout our meal. The food was delicious, although the smoke duck was a bit on the salty side, but the service made the entire dining experience even better. Thank you for maintaining such high standards — I’ll definitely be coming back again with my family! Special thanks to Crystal for her special sauce, it's was delicious, and also Evan for his service, ensuring we have a great experience throughout our meal.. Thanks Crystal and Evan! Hope to see you again.. :)
Crystal and Evan were serving and introducing us on there premium meats, hidden gem of best  chilli sauce dip. Both of them provided the best service. Everything was great. 👍🏻👍🏻

This is so bad.. I don’t know why the food in this outlet tasted so so blend!!! And the grill was not hot as always when I when to the other outlets.. I’m so disappointed with this……. I’m not sure why the Indian guy in the counter back was not marinating the food well!!!! So so bad.. unlike the bugis and Northpoint outlet .. those were so good!!! Took the premium items topped up more but gotten this. I had to add my own seasoning to make it taste better…… shouldn’t have when here

My favourite halal hotpot ever, staff Crystal & Evan from harbourfront is very friendly to serve us...even crystal make us a special BBQ sauce. The meats section never fail me and hope the best for them and create more promotion for the peeps as well.. keep up the good job 👍🏻
